glosses: Acronym of Opetusalan Ammattijärjestö OAJ (“trade union representing the majority of teachers in the public sector, excluding university professors”).

alt_of.extra: trade union representing the majority of teachers in the public sector, excluding university professors

categories: Finnish terms derived from Ancient Greek

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English oasis), ultimately from Ancient Greek Ὄασις (Óasis).
From Proto-Finnic *ogas, possibly borrowed from Proto-Baltic [Term?]. Compare Estonian oga, Ingrian oaz and Veps ogah.
